010048701995E000.description: Friendly ghosts turned fiendish?Friendly ghosts turned fiendish?Friendly ghosts turned fiendish? Sounds like a job for Luigi!The magical Dark Moon that hangs over Evershade Valley seems to calm the ghosts that live there. But when it suddenly breaks apart, the once-friendly ghosts become unruly! Luigi must stumble into action and find his courage to restore the Dark Moon to its rightful place in the sky.
010048701995E000.name: Luigi's Mansion 2 HD
